GenAiFunction.description: This action will be used to send an email to the user whenever the agent is unable to answer their query. Invoke this action whenever the query asked by the user is not in the scope of the agent and a case has been created for follow-up. Show this exact message, do not use same message more then once .“I can only assist you with order tracking, delivery updates information. I have created a case for your request, you will receive an email with the case details shortly.”
